goalSetting.title: Beha Sepheo sa Hao sa Pele
goalSetting.mainQuestion: Leeto le leng le le leng le hloka sebaka sa ho fihla. Ke sepheo sa hau sa pele sa lichelete sefe se seholo?
goalSetting.instruction: Khetha e 'ngoe ho qala. U ka e fetola hamorao.
goalSetting.customPlaceholder: Kenya chelete ea hau ea sepheo

goals.retirement: Qala Chelete ea Ka ea Ho Tsoa Mosebetsing

goalSet.title: Sepheo se Behiloe! üéâ
goalSet.message: Hantle! U behile sepheo sa hau ho {{amount}} bakeng sa {{goalTitle}}. Ha re qale ho ithuta ka mokhoa oa chelete e kopaneng!

simulate.title: Etsa mohlala
simulate.subtitle: Bona kamoo chelete ea hau e ka holang/kunyamehang ka nako
simulate.conservativeDesc: Kotsi e nyane, meputso e tsitsitseng
simulate.aggressiveDesc: Kotsi e phahameng, meputso e phahameng e ka bang teng
simulate.paymentTooSmall: ‚ö†Ô∏è Tefo e nyane haholo ho lefa mokoloto kapa nako e felile ka chelete e setseng:
simulate.add200Desc: Lefa R200 e eketsehileng khoeli le khoeli ho fokotsa moputso le likhoeli.
simulate.add500Desc: Lefa R500 e eketsehileng khoeli le khoeli ho lefa ka potlako.
simulate.roundUp100Desc: Phatlalatsa tefo ea hau ho R100 e latelang.
simulate.thirteenthDesc: Etsa tefo e lekanang le e 'ngoe e eketsehileng ea khoeli le khoeli ka selemo.
simulate.compoundGrowthInsight: Chelete ea hau e ka holang ho feta ho pharalla ha monehelo oa hau ka nt≈°etso-pele e kopaneng!
simulate.timeInsight: Ka {{years}} lilemo, u fa moputso o kopaneng nako e lekaneng ho sebetsa.
simulate.contributionInsight: Mosebetsi o motle! Ho kenya R{{amount}} khoeli le khoeli ho u beha tseleng e matla ea ho fihlella maikemisetso a hau.
simulate.debtInsight: Ho eketsa tefo ea hau ka le ho le mong feela o ka fokotsa haholo likhoeli tsa ho lefa le ho fokotsa moputso o feletseng.
simulate.savingsTableHint: Poloko: moputso oa selemo o tloaela ho eketseha ha chelete e holang (e kopaneng).
simulate.debtTableHint: Mokoloto: moputso oa selemo o tloaela ho fokotsa ha chelete ea mantlha e lefshoa.
simulate.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Sena ke mohlala o bonolo bakeng sa litlhahiso tsa thuto. Meputso ea 'nete e ka fapana haholo ka lebaka la phetoho ea mmaraka, melemo le lintlha tse ling. T≈°ebetso ea khale ha e tiise liphello tsa bokamoso.
simulate.chartError: Karolo ea chata e hlolehile ho bont≈°'a. Sena se etsahala hangata ha module ea motheo ea react-native-svg e sa hokahane/e sa kenngoe ho thehoa ha sesebelisoa. U ntse u ka sebelisa simulator ntle le chata.
simulate.chartFixTips: Maano a ho lokisa: iOS ‚Üí `cd ios && pod install`, ebe u hloekisa & u haha hape. Android ‚Üí `cd android && ./gradlew clean`, ebe u haha hape.
simulate.investmentProjectionData: Lintlha tsa mohlala oa ho kenya chelete
simulate.scenarioProjection: Mohlala ona oa {{scenarioName}} o bonts'a moputso oa selemo oa {{returnRate}}% o kopaneng khoeli le khoeli. Ka lintlha tsa hau tsa hona joale ka holimo ho {{years}} {{yearUnit}}, kakaretso ea hau e hlalosang e tla ba {{total}} e leng {{growth}} nt≈°etso-pele e kopaneng.
simulate.scenarioImplication: Se se bolelang: Mokhoa oa {{scenarioName}} o lebisitse ho ka bang {{returnRate}}% ka selemo ka kakaretso ka linako tse telele, o amohela phetoho ea {{volatility}}.
simulate.scenarioDisclaimer: Meputso ea 'nete e fapane; sena ha se tiisetso. E sebelise ho utloisisa kamoo sekhahla le nako li fetolang liphello.

compounding.title: Boselamose ba Kgolo ya Chelete
compounding.description: Ithute kamoo chelete ya hao e ka holang ka tsela e potlakileng ka nako ka matla a tswala e kopantsweng.

concept.title: Mohopolo
concept.content: Nahana hore o na le sefate sa chelete. Tswala e kopantsweng e tshwana le ho tjhala dipeu tse welang sefateng sa hao, hore di hole di be difate tse ntjha tsa chelete.

coreIdea.title: Mohopolo wa Mantlha
coreIdea.content: O fumana tswala cheleteng ya hao. Ebe o fumana *tswala ho tswala ya hao*. Hoo ke boselamose.

interactive.title: E Bone e Sebetsa
interactive.content: Ha re e bone e sebetsa. Hula se lahlegwang ho bona kamoo matsete a R10,000 a holang ka teng ka 8% tswala.

quiz.title: Potso e Potlakileng
quiz.question: Ke eng se nang le matla a maholo bakeng sa kgolo ya chelete?

emergencyFund.title: Chelete ya Maemo a Mathateng e Hlalositswe
emergencyFund.description: Lebaka leo o hlokang chelete ya maemo a mathateng le hore na o lokela ho boloka bokae pele o ka peeletsa.

why.title: Hobaneng o Inahane?
why.content: Bophelo bo a etsahala‚Äîho lahlehelwa ke mosebetsi, ho lokiswa ha dikoloi, ditefiso tsa bongaka. Chelete ya maemo a mathateng e thibela hore o kene mekolotong (kapa ho rekisa matsete ka nako e mpe).

howMuch.title: Ke Bokae?
howMuch.content: Molao o tloaelehileng: dikgwedi tse 3‚Äì6 tsa ditshenyehelo tsa bohlokwa. Qala ka sepheo se senyane (R5,000‚ÄìR10,000), ebe o haha.

interactive.title: Sepheo sa Hao
interactive.content: Hula ho beha dilo tsa bohlokwa tsa kgwedi (rente, dijo, dipalangwa). Re tla o bontsisa sepheo sa maemo a mathateng sa dikgwedi tse 3‚Äì6.

quiz.title: Tlhahlobo e Potlakileng
quiz.question: Chelete ya maemo a mathateng e lokela ho bolokelwa hokae?

options.volatileStock: Ho ETF ya masheya a fetohang
options.safeAccount: Ho akhaonte e sireletsehileng, e bonolo ho e fihla

firstPortfolio.title: Ho Haha Pothifolio ya Hao ya Pele
firstPortfolio.description: Etsa pothifolio ya matsete e fapaneng e lumellanang le sepheo sa hao le ho amohela kotsi.

goals.title: Qala ka Sepheo
goals.content: Nako + sepheo = kabo. Sepheo sa nako e khutshwane ‚Üí thepa e sireletsehileng. Sepheo sa nako e telele ‚Üí thepa ya kgolo e ngata.

diversify.title: Ho Fapanya
diversify.content: Tswakanya mefuta ya thepa (masheya, dipanka, chelete) le libaka hore e le nngwe e lahlehelwang e se ke ya ntsha sekepe kaofela.

interactive.title: Leka Kabo
interactive.content: Sisinyetsa di-slider tsa masheya/dipanka/chelete. Bona phetoho e etsisang le poelo ya nako e telele li fetoga ka nako ya nnete.

quiz.title: Tlhahlobo e Potlakileng
quiz.question: Ke molemo ofe o moholo wa ho fapanya?

options.maximizeGains: Ho eketsa dipoelo tsa nako e khutshwane
options.reduceRisk: Ho fokotsa kotsi ho tswa matsetseng a le mong

riskReturn.title: Ho Utloisisa Kotsi le Chelete e Khutlang
riskReturn.description: Fumana kamano pakeng tsa kotsi le menyetla ya chelete e khutlang ho peeletso.

intro.title: Kotsi ke Eng?
intro.content: Kotsi ke hore peeletso ya hao e ka nyoloha hakae kapa e we. Kotsi e phahameng e ka bolela phaello e phahameng ‚Äî empa hape le ho wa ho hoholo.

tradeoff.title: Phapano
tradeoff.content: Thepa e sireletsehileng (joalo ka chelete) e na le chelete e khutlang e tlase. Thepa e kotsing (joalo ka di-stock) e ka hola ho feta ka nako empa e sisinyeha ho feta.

interactive.title: Khetha Tsela ya Hao
interactive.content: Tsamaisa selaedara pakeng tsa "ho sireletseha" le "kotsi" ho bona hore ho fetoha le chelete e khutlang ya nako e telele ho ka fetohang joang.

options.A: Chelete e khutlang e phahameng kamehla e bolela kotsi e tlase
options.B: Chelete e khutlang e phahameng e ka bang teng hangata e tla le kotsi e phahameng

taxEfficient.title: Ho Peeletsa ka Mokgwa o Sebetsang ka Methelo
taxEfficient.description: Ithute ka di-account tse se nang methelo / tse nang mehola ya methelo le ho beha ka bohlale ho boloka ho fetisa tse khutlang ho uena.

wrappers.title: Sebedisa Sekoahelo
wrappers.content: Di-account tse nang mehola ya methelo tse kang RA, di sireletsa kgolo/dipoelo ho methelo tse ding.

placement.title: Sebaka sa Thepa
placement.content: Beha thepa e sa sebetseng hantle ka methelo (mohlala, di-bond funds, batefelo ba dipoelo tse phahameng) di-accounteng tse sireletsehileng methelweng pele.

interactive.title: Ho Beha ka Bohlale
interactive.content: Hula di-funds ho "Tse nang Methelo" kapa "Tse nang Mehola ya Methelo" dipokete. Bona kamoo tekanyo ya ka mora methelo e ntlafatsang.

quiz.title: Hlahloba Kapele
quiz.question: Ke kgato efe eo ka tlwaelo e SEBETSANG HAHOLOANYANE ka methelo?

options.A: Ho tshwara di-bond funds accounteng e nang mehola ya methelo
options.B: Ho tshwara di-bond funds accounteng ya brokerage e nang methelo

firstLesson.title: Thuto ya Pele
firstLesson.description: Qedela thuto ya hao ya pele

reward.collectedMessage: O hapile data ya 500MB! E natefele!
reward.alreadyCollectedMessage: O se o nkile moputso wa hao wa 500MB!
reward.notEligibleMessage: Qedela diphihlello tsohle ho nka moputso wa hao!

takeYourTime.title: Nka Nako
takeYourTime.description: O se ke wa potlakela dithuto. Nka nako ho utlwisisa mohopolo o mong le o mong.

practiceMakesPerfect.title: Boitlhwariso bo tlisa Phetheho
practiceMakesPerfect.description: Boela dithutong mme o leke dikarolo tse sebedisanang makgetlo a mangata.

learnDaily.title: Ithute Letsatsi le Letsatsi
learnDaily.description: Sebedisa metsotso e 5-10 feela letsatsi le letsatsi ho aha tsebo ya hao ya ditjhelete.

errors.noUserSignedIn: Ha ho na mosebedisi ya keneng
errors.userDocumentNotFound: Tokomane ya mosebedisi ha e fumanwe
